Microvan Hammond 2022-05-26 Chapter1 About The case describes a project by Grosse Pointe Associates (GPA) investigating the potential market for “microvans”. The objectives of this case are: 1. To give you experience segmenting customers in a market 2. To have you determine which segment(s) would be good to target based on analysis of the data. 3. To have you relate the segment(s) to demographic variables potentially useful for targeting # multivariate analysis and basic descriptive statistics library(psych) # data processing library(dplyr) library(tidyverse) library(data.table) # plot library(ggplot2) library(corrplot) # rMarkdown library(rmarkdown) # file path management library(here)

Chapter2 Executive Summary The case describes a project by Grosse Pointe Associates (GPA) investigating the potential market for “microvans”. The objectives of this case are: 1. To give you experience segmenting customers in a market 2. To have you determine which segment(s) would be good to target based on analysis of the data. 3. To have you relate the segment(s) to demographic variables potentially useful for targeting.
Chapter4 Explorative Data Analysis 4.1 Correlation Analysis 4.2 Eigenvalues
